title: EPL : Fresh update on Mount future at Chelsea revealed
body_text:
Sport
EPL: Fresh update on Mount’s future at Chelsea revealed
Transfer guru, Fabrizio Romano, has provided an update on midfielder Mason Mount’s future at Chelsea.
Romano said that Liverpool are in pole position to sign Mount this summer.
Mount is currently in a contract standoff with Chelsea as he is keen to see his £80,000-per-week wage tripled at Stamford Bridge.
As a result, Liverpool have identified the England international, who has also been linked with Man United, Manchester City and Newcastle United, as a top transfer target.
Writing in his column, Caught Offside, Romano said: “Despite reported interest from Arsenal in Mason Mount, Liverpool remain the favourites for the Blues midfielder, as they consider Mount one of their top priorities for the summer transfer window.
“But it all depends on Chelsea’s new deal negotiations and also their manager situation. I think it is not about Champions League football, it is about the project. The real timing for Mount’s decision will be May/June, not now.”
